website_summaries.verdict: Powerful, versatile, and easy to use; but it has been known to come with some longevity and quality-control concerns.
pros: Quickly and easily takes on tough cleaning jobs
Large, never-flat wheels for all-terrain maneuverability
5 easy-change nozzles for intricate to large tasks
cons: Some reports of lost pressure and engine issues after several weeks or months of ownership
A few customers received damaged packaging or parts upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of pressure washers, and never have I seen one this bad! I am waiting to get my return authorization so that I can send it back. Unit is very flimsy. Wheels are so loose they shake when you roll it. Pressure wand feels like it's ready to break at any minute. And it ran for only about 3 minutes before it smelled like the rings were burning up in the engine! Oil level is perfect, and I use only ethanol-free gas in my engines, so this is definitely a manufacturing defect of some kind. I promise it will be the last Wen product that I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this item but as soon as i got it u can see it had been seating in the warehouse for a wait. The box looked very old. I open it and the washer was all full of dust. I put it all together. Oil gas etc. Connected the hose bleed the water out the system and 30 pulls later would not start. Unhook the hose and it started but ran badly. Makes me think something was wrong with the pump. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Infante

customer_reviews.title: great pressure washer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: got this after realizing that electric washers are just too small for most jobs. this is awesome. out of the box to running was about 20 minutes. would have been nice to include oil in the kit, but not an issue. the washer has power to spare and the tips are well placed for easy changing. i did lose my 12 degree when it did not secure properly and shot off and vanished. my fault. tip; you need to be sure the tip is properly seated and locked prior to use :-) cleaned my trex deck and pavers with amazing speed. used it to spray vinyl siding and chairs, 100 more things we will be using it for!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: washer ran well for a bit over ten minutes then sounded like engine was having oiling problems or something
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. After assembly, adding gas, and adding oil, washer ran well for a bit over ten minutes then sounded like engine was having oiling problems or something. Vibrated excessively and sounded like engine was having problems whenever trigger was pulled for pressure washing. Water pump was leaking also and that would continue to get worse. Sending back for refund. Lot of work to drain oil, gas, and repack for shipping. Quite a pain for a well reviewed item. Won't buy a WEN product again.
customer_reviews.author: Papaw

customer_reviews.title: Great washer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky when it comes to pressure washers and after reading reviews I decided to try this one. Box arrived with no defects and I put it right to work. It fired right up and has great pressure. So far I'm glad I got this washer. The only concern I had was the vibration of the engine popped the tips out of the holder. Instead I keep them now in my tool box. The large wheels seems a little wonky and cheap to me but we will see. Overall I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 6 weeks .... waiting on replacement because out of the one month prime warranty
customer_reviews.text: initially , I loved it. Easy to run and use and great power effectiveness , But the bottom bolt always came off so that the frame was unstable- that was an easy fix with a new washer . But after 8 weeks ,the machine just stopped working.I am sending it back for repair or replacement after trying what the Tech suggested . Customer service is good so far , so I will review again, when replacement comes in. No new warranty with new item... So new item gets only 7.4 months instead of a year like a regular new item . Can figure whats up with that .
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: First time using this pressure washer and it worked well for me and my wife's trucks. Only issue I had from wheeling it around was the cotter pins to hold wheels on. One of the cotter pins got flipped around and poked a hole in the soap container. Probably just flip pins around and put cotter pins on outside of wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Evyn Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Reliable !
customer_reviews.text: Used this quite a few times with it sitting between each, it has gas shut iff I use turn it on choke off and fired up everytime wish my lawnmower would ... works great, tons of power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this pressure washer for a while now
customer_reviews.text: Overall this pressure washer has performed very well. The only reason I did not give it 5 starts is the pins holding the wheels in place fell off the first time I pushed this machine across the yard. It was very easy to fix and they haven't come loose since I used a piece of wire instead of the pin. Everything else has performed as advertised. It starts easy. It pumps water efficiently. It has more than enough washing power for sidings, steps and walks. It is easy to move around. It is easy to set up and tear down. It feels very well built and I expect it to last a long time before I need to replace anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a reliable power washer. It is easy to start and runs without hesitation. The first unit delivered appeared to be used. It had oil in the engine. The box was badly damaged. I called the manufacture who said that Amazon had a practice of re-selling returned units. The manufacture was great, however. They readily replaced the unit with new one. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was shipped well, but gas tank assy come apart in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped in a decent container. I noticed a loose part sound while unpacking and learned that the assembly inside of the gas tank had come loose. There was no way to access what had come loose, not to mention how to fix it. Packaged it back-up and returned the unit. Amazon was great about the return. I like the design, especially the 3100 PSI and the larger wheels. It would have been a good tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Takes about 15 minutes. Very powerful and does a great job. Used it twice so far with no issues. Hopefully it will last for a long time. Much plastic which concerns me, even the pull handle is plastic but hopefully the plastic will not break. I would recommend this unit. Cleaned our concrete deck quickly. Looks good and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Good Washer!
customer_reviews.text: Starting our third year with this washer. Still runs like new! I use only ethanol free gas with Stayble(sp?) and run the gas out of it at the end of the season. Started on third pull, only because I didn’t turn the cutoff switch to “run”. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs for a bit then shuts off and wont run.
customer_reviews.text: I went in for a Christmas present for my mom (she loves power washing) with my brothers for Christmas of 2017. The power washer was not used until spring 2018 due to cold weather and it is typically only used to wash the deck and pool concrete. The unit was used in 2019 for the normal pool cleaning and just again now for the 3rd time about 14 mo's after it's first use. The unit runs for a few minutes and then will bog down and die and will not restart w/o extreme effort. Oil is full, gas is fresh. I can't recommend this power washer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Levine

customer_reviews.title: Best performance at super price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, Easy to assemble. Easy 1 pull starting. Used for 6 straight hours with not a hiccup. Checked oil level in motor and pump every hour and at end of use. No oil consumed and oil is still golden. Draining of soap tank is easy, emptying gas tank for storage is not but I dont see how any could be. Used a separate turbo nozzle and this provided great pressure to make driveway cleaning easy. Good clearance for supply and pressure lines compared to other brands that route lines directly against wheels causing abrasion and ruptures. very clear Amazon Choice award winner.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: It was dead on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars because I purchased another model and it worked well. This unit would not start up when I received it. My brother in law is a mechanic and he couldn't get it started. We called customer service and got a manager who said he would call back, but never did. We returned it to Amazon and got a full refund. I wish it had worked. I was going to buy another one, but this model was sold out at the time. I had to settle for the 2,800 which work well but is less powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this machine
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this machine! It's solid, well-built, powerful... I've started a side business with it, that's how much I like it. I've used many pressure- and power-washers over the years, this one is ranked at the top for me. It's easy to assemble and maintain as well. If you want a pressure washer of your own, buy the WEN PW31 with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: thealamo67

customer_reviews.title: Easy, powerful, satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes with easy to follow instructions, includes the tools to assemble, and clearly marked bags containing which part is which. It took me no time at all before I had it all together, filled it with oil and gasoline, and testing its strength. Some test runs on the dirtiest parts of the driveway let me see how much power each nozzle would be putting out. The following day I washed the entire house (2 story) with no surprises or let downs. I've run the engine about four hours now, so far I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Use this pressure washer for a few weeks now. Well actually just twice at my house but had it for a few weeks. It is working as it should. Great power. So far I am happy with my purchase. I will update as time goes on after more usage.
customer_reviews.author: K-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one for quite awhile. Made a good choice here. This thing will take a toe off...or at least my it really really clean. I bought the turbo nozzle with it and the thing sounds like a buzz saw when it goes to work. I’m cleaning everything. The yard furniture, planters, the concrete, pool scale, pool filters, minibikes, the kids’ teeth, windows, the truck and car.... somebody stop me. It’s like therapy.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonSavage

customer_reviews.title: Runs great and has excellent water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for just about a year and used it on many project. Runs great and has excellent water pressure. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: SirKnight

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pressure washer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this washer almost 3 years ago and have never had a problem with it. I change the oil yearly and make sure that is properly drained before putting up for the winter. Every year I take it out in the spring and put the choke on and it starts up after 2 pulls. I use it a couple of days a week until October. It is small and easy to maneuver and most important IT STARTS EVERY TIME after one or two pulls! I use it for everything: our patio, brick walks, concrete walks and foundation. We also use it to clean our windows. It is a quality washer.
customer_reviews.author: BMC56

customer_reviews.title: JUNKIE
customer_reviews.text: Item ordered in winter time and didn't open the box to check when it was delivered because it wasn't the right time to use it. I opened the box today 04/16/19 because weather is over 70degrees in NYC to wash my walls and this is what I found in unboxing, air filter compartment broken, water spraying gun broken. I tried parching the broken parts up with glue and start it to see if it works but nothing is working for me. I can't return it because the return date has passed. Buyers buy with caution. Money wasted!!
customer_reviews.author: gabriel a hudson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sooner than stated. Easy assembly. works great
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived ahead of schedule and was very easy to assemble. 15 minutes tops if you know how to operate a wrench and screwdriver. Filled with oil n gas. Unit stared right up and runs smooth. Units performs very well. All tip have useful function from the foam tip to the various degree tips, each one is perfect. The Zero degree etch your name in a treated timber. The 30 foot hose is great. All parts appear well made and solid. I have run the unit so far for about a total of 9 hours and it has worked as I would expect and desire. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality in every way + fair price!
customer_reviews.text: It's rare to find a company produce such a quality piece of machinery with a fair price. Wen did a great job delivering all the right features with great attention to detail. They prob could have charged another $100-$200 but they chose to provide class and quality to the majority of us who can't throw $500+ to a power washer. Thanks WEN!
customer_reviews.author: G. Loope

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the power of this washer. Wow, it's my first and what an awesome difference it has made. Every surface that I used it on definitely looks different. So far so good with easy cranking, easy nozzle switch and allowing for engine break in to see longevity. It's going to get a lot of work. Wen is making a difference in the tool market.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Scott

customer_reviews.title: Rock, rattle and spray...
customer_reviews.text: We've used it one time and the motor mounts holding it to the metal frame/dolly already broke. The motor rattles and vibrates like crazy. We plan to buy bungee chords and strap it down securely again, bc we'd rather not pay to ship it back. The spray is super strong and seems to work well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: bad pump
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after conducting research. Found that it was supposed to be rated high. Loud grinding noise, the pressure builds up for a second and drops back off to zero pressure. Contacted the company about issue. No response from email. Hopefully this unit was just one out of a bad batch, I would be willing to try another unit, if the company would contact me. Awaiting before I just return the entire unit for refund. More to follow soon.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Coker

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Washer has a lot of power!
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer works great and is easy to start. I have a weak heart and was afraid that I wouldn't be able to start the washer engine with the pull rope, but it hasn't been a problem and starts easily. When the washer arrived via UPS the box was pretty beat up and had a hole in the box. After opening the box I discovered that the pressure wand was missing. I contacted the manufacturer and they sent me a new wand replacement within two days. It's a great product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: A beast
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of psi. Starts easy and hose is long enough. Big wheels makes it easy to move throughout the yard. Neighbor bought a cheaper lower psi and now ask to borrow mine L. Recommend this to all my friends and the price is lower than the big name suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Has not let me down. Works great. I am very picky on pressure washers. My last 2 were a Honda and a Subaru. This thing smokes both of them. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: RANDY MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I received my PW31 3100 very quickly and it arrived in perfect shape. Easy assembly. I've used it to clean my lawn furniture and driveway and it performed perfectly. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer was substantially assembled right from the box. Hose hook-ups were easy-peasy and the 5 nozzles allow for a variety of different angles for the pressurized water stream to fit almost any job. I bought this one to replace one I bought several years earlier but which I didn't properly service for winter storage - that was on me. The ONLY negative was the rubber foot on the bottom front of the washer melted quickly when I placed it to was the deck. However WEN immediately sent me a replacement and I just need to be more careful. Definitely recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Good value and product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase so far. The large tires make it easy to move/ roll. The directions were easy to follow and this 60 year old woman was able to do the limited assembly with out any assistance. It started right away and runs great. I am hopeful it will give me many years of service. It was a really good price and Amazon's 2 day prime shipping got it to me quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon99

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears to be excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it once to wash about 200 ft. of picket fence. Plenty of power and easy to use. Be careful that you don't burn yourself on the muffler, which is in a location near where the water hose is attached. Does require a much stronger pull on the starter rope than other engines I have used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Behrends

customer_reviews.title: START AND STOP
customer_reviews.text: I received this pressure washer putting it all together and started it up after putting 10w30 oil and gas in it and adjusting the choke and gas cocks,it ran for about 25 minutes with some smoke coming out of the air filter,I think it was just some machining oil burn off but ran good for about 10 minutes than quit running,I tryed for 7 several times to start it again and It would not restart,I think there is a choke or a carburetor problem with it ..........I would not recommend this pressure washer to any one.
customer_reviews.author: James H Rolston

customer_reviews.title: This Wen pressure washer is no good'
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this pressure no stars!!!! the first one I ordered worked once I returned it and the second one you sent does not work at all!! I'm having to send it back and I don't have the box what do I do? This time I just want my money back!! My husband is not happy at all. I understand stand one but not both do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. However the carton that the machine was shipped seen better days. Engine needs oil before you start it (not included). After adding fuel and oil and hooking up the water supply the engine started on the second pull. Ran perfect all day. Make sure you change the oil after the first 8 hrs of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just because the packaging does not look damaged doesn’t mean the contents are ok
customer_reviews.text: Unit came damaged which I did not discover until I assembled it. The box was not damaged so the damage had to have occurred at the factory. The recoil starter unit was pushed in which I did not see until I tried to pull starter cord. I contacted WEN and they sent new recoil starter. When I tried to install it I found the damage was greater than I previously saw. The engine where to recoil unit attached was damaged and the new unit could not be bolted on. This has been a frustrating experience to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Flexer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very efficient and easy to use. Good value. Great price. You may consider upgrading the hose and buying new nozzles, but otherwise a great buy. Hope it lasts 10 years or more!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband for fathers day 2019. Its easy to move around, it has enough power to tackle tough jobs. Make quick work of cleaning concrete around pool. Easy to start. Love this product. Would DEFINITELY recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine, easy to assemble and use. Quite powerful for effective cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around with the large wheels and handle
customer_reviews.text: What a difference between this unit and my old 2400 psi unit! Starts with one or two pulls every time, even after sitting for 2 months. Easy to move around with the large wheels and handle. The longish hose is great, I can leave the washer down on the lawn and pressure wash my raised deck.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Vennell

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer. I thought it would be hard to start, but to my surprise it was not. I am happy with my purchase. This is the 2nd WEN product I have owned. They are easily becoming my go to brand. The price is always lower than the top competing brands, like Toro, Simpson, Troy, but just as powerful as those top brands
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching and exploring pressure washers and purchased the WEN PW3100 . I have used it 18+ hours and I am completely satisfied! Easy to assemble, starts easily and is powerful. Highly suggest this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRESSURE WASHER. LIKE THE 30 FOOT HOSE AND 2 YR. FACTORY WARRANTY
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: well made, lots of power
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy to assemble - good instructions. Lots of power! The hose length is sufficient. I bought a pressure control part to add to it to vary the power...time will tell just how well it does.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure and nice features
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure and nice features. Recommended highly. Just don't put too much oil in the thing and it will start easily.. don't ask me how I know that.
customer_reviews.author: John Skull

customer_reviews.title: product missing parts and used in box but sold as new
customer_reviews.text: this product was missing the hose and HAD oil in it. We will be reporting this to the carrier as a hazardous issue.
customer_reviews.author: Harpo

customer_reviews.title: A quality product! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! This pressure washer makes the work more enjoyable, which can easily be daunting with less powerful machines! Starts up very easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Javantavius

customer_reviews.title: Cold not be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cold not be happier with this purchase. Well constructed, started without any issue and did the job I purchased it for. Cleaned the (very large) driveway, house, gutters, awning and cars. Now I hope for many years of use. No apparent reason why it shouldn't give it. Not a bad purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sketch

customer_reviews.title: residential beast
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Loads of power. Really good construction. Nice features like bungee that retains the hose when not in use and the tip holders keep them securely in place. Filled up the oil and gas and fired right up and haven't had a hiccup since. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: skinnyspike

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've sold commercial pressure cleaning in the past and I have to say that I'm impressed with the pressure and efficiency of this unit. Not only is it well built, the engine started and purred like a kitten. The pressure was very impressive and I have to say i'm more than pleased with my purchase. DK-Summerville, SC
customer_reviews.author: Sondra King

customer_reviews.title: Pretty efficient and powerful for the price
customer_reviews.text: My dislikes are; 1) The tips fall off too easily while in operation. 2) The limited volume in the gas tank allows for initially about 2.5 hours of consistent work before refuelling. My likes are; 1) The unit is solid and can handle a great volume of work. 2) It is easy to assemble and even easier to operate. 3) The unit cleans efficiently on the first application and there's no need for work to be redone.
customer_reviews.author: anderson abraham

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable power washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power washer. Our dogs are forever getting the decks dirty, and the mud gets ground into the Trex wood graining. This power washer is easy to use, and has worked extremely well on all the surfaces that need washing, including the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L Perez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a box that looked like it took way to much rough handling. The box was trashed. The wand trigger plastic piece was damaged. see pic. Hopefully the company will send me a replacement handle. It works wonderful, great quality and easy to start. I love Wen products, I have many.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pressure washer. Quick setup. Easy starting. I love this thing! It's actually even better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Motor sputter right out of the box, pressure washer does not have any power
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Amazon. assembly was no problem. I put gasoline 89 in, followed instructions, started, the engine sputters, played with the choke, did not help. The other problem is the spray gun, there is very little water coming out, and then suddenly there lots of pressure for 15 seconds, and then it dies. Would not recommend the machine
customer_reviews.author: stock51

customer_reviews.title: husband likes
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several models and pricing.....this one serves the purpose and works great. I always have a clean car now. My husband has washed the porch, house, roof, dog pen and vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when its running it does a fantastic job, my unit shuts off randomly when in ...
customer_reviews.text: when its running it does a fantastic job, my unit shuts off randomly when in use. It restarts with no issues but I find myself running back and forth from the cleaning project to restart the engine multiple times in a fairly short period of time. Otherwise, I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great piece of machinery. We used it LOTS right away and it worked great. Our only problem is that the tips fall out of their holders. We lost one pulling it through the yard the first day. It was the green one and we couldn’t see it! It did a great job on siding and concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W.

customer_reviews.title: LOOKED LIKE IT WAS DRAGGED FROM CA TO BOSTON BY HORSE-HAD ...
customer_reviews.text: SORRY, HAD TO RETURN IT, LOOKED LIKE IT WAS DRAGGED FROM CA TO BOSTON BY HORSE-HAD TO RETURN IT AND BOUGHT A GENERAC CASUSE THE DEALWAS GONE AND THEY WERE UT OF STOCK-WEN IS BETTER THOUGH
customer_reviews.author: Dan Onishuk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pressure washer for a few months now I have a small pressure washing business I have had absolutely no problems with it and it works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Wick.designs

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, uneven spray with wide nozzles.
customer_reviews.text: Happy overall. One rub is that the wide angle nozzles have sharp streams on the edges that scored my deck. The narrow angle has an even spray, so I use it and just have to be careful to not get too close.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shefman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I settled on this Wen 3100 psi model and couldn't be more pleased. Nothing about it feels cheaply made, yet it was $100 less expensive than most of its nearest competitors. It was very easy to assemble and get up and running. You'll definitely want a small funnel to add the oil. I've used it for about 5 hours now and it has handled everything I've asked of it here in Florida, mildew capital of the world. Thank you, Wen, for caring about the quality of your products!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid mechanics, get new nozzls.
customer_reviews.text: Engine is good and solid. Simple assembly. the nozzle holder is a bit wonky, i had tips flying off that were seemingly secure. the nozzles themselves seem kinda weak; lucky for me i kept the tips from my old washer that one gave up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Agey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this product fell apart so I'm in the process of returning it. The base separated from the engine because of bad design and started to spew oil over the ground. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've used pressure washers before so the learning curve was short. Started righ up out of the box but I had a prob,em keeping it running which ended up being my fault. Their help desk was very good getting me through my stupidity. I would suggest getting ear protection, like I said I've used them and find they help a lot when this is running for hours. I did have one problem with the spare nozzles popping out of their holders due to vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice washer with a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice washer with a good price. It takes less then 1 hour to assemble with instructions you can actually follow. I was very impressed with the power this unit puts out. Sure glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: FiveStar

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer!!!! Started on first pull!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received a day early! Assembled very easily (missing one screw but I had another) so no worries. It started on the first pull after adding gas and oil. Very very easy to pull!!!! Already washed 2 of our vehicles and part of the house. So far on day 1 this is a great pressure washer!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I have only used this once and overall worked great. However
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once and overall worked great. However, the high pressure hose stuck together during use and the hose is frayed and damaged. Not sure if this covered under the two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Anonmous

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after a year
customer_reviews.text: I got mine a year ago and it is still going strong. I would recommend it. For the price, it is a great machine. It is powerful and made with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and customer support!
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is great! The customer service provided by WEN/Amazon was outstanding as well. The unit was delivered defective. I called to report it, 2 days later a new one was delivered to my door. I unpacked the new one and it works outstanding, super powerful and easy to start!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pressure washer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer has been amazing. I run a business, have used it at least 50 times and this thing has not quit on me. I will buy another when the first decides to kick the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Was a beautiful piece, though
customer_reviews.text: Kept shutting off - maybe from overheating? Had to return and order different pressure washer. Was a beautiful piece, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works good but the rubber motor mounts broke the second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Had to remount on frame without mounts really a bad design trying to get mount bolts out of base!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: james e mcknight sr

customer_reviews.title: new pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I broke my water inlet tube on my previous pressure washer machine. It was 2200 psi. I purchased the WEN pressure washer, 3100 psi, and have been very pleased with it's performance. Starts easily, moves well with the large wheels, and cleans house and driveway very well.
customer_reviews.author: DennisHignight

customer_reviews.title: Hose quality problem.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad washer but problem with hose. Blew out of handle while washing. No easy way to fix. We are in Honduras.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. So much so that my friends are borrowing it to power wash there driveways & patios. Price is right on too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about six hours now and it has worked perfectly. It is easy to start and really runs good. I have been using it to pressure wash siding and it has been doing a great job. Good washer!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Eversull

customer_reviews.title: The pressure washer works great. Just when I went to fill the soap ...
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer works great. Just when I went to fill the soap tank up I noticed that it was leaking fluid. I found that when they put the wheels on they jammed a cotter key into the jug leaving a hole at the bottom of the soap jug. If they will replace my soap jug without me having to send the whole thing back that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hein

customer_reviews.title: It is a good unit otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Lost pressure my third time using it, so we'll see how this goes. It is a good unit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love our pressure washer. We have almost had it for a year now and it still works as great as the day we got it. We use it a lot and for everything
customer_reviews.author: Cyrilla

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate everyone else's reviews for these products! I love this power washer and attachment. I never thought my driveway would get that clean...and that quickly!! Should have done this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amy h.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Late review. Have only used twice but so far this is an excellent washer, well thought out and constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Luther McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to move around, starts quickly, and the onboard soap tank is a plus. You could spend a lot more, but why should you when this WEN delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer!! Works beautifully. Powerful, versatile and easily mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A1 customer service
customer_reviews.text: Got it and would not stay running for more than 2 mins at a time then just shut off. I called customer service my call was immediately taken care of. I was told to remove foam filter around air intake, started 1 pull and runs amazungly well. And very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer has plenty of power and I like the 30 foot hose. Price is right for this portable unit.
customer_reviews.author: harold cambell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice powerwasher
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. Used for cleaning sidewalks, vinyl siding,vinyl fence and wooden fence. Great power and control. The on/off switch vibrated itself off after just a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mangouranes

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am a property manager and this power washer works great! The maintenance personnel love this power washer.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice unit. Has the right parts on it that it should last you a long time. If you live in an area with frost or it freezes, you need to make sure the pump is dry or store the washer in a warm area for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: wonder washer
customer_reviews.text: Power washer is powerful and easy to use. I power washed everything when I received it. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great Washer, Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Received this last week and was anxious to use it at our latest investment property. Purchased the Surface Cleaner attachment with it and cleaned the entire driveway, front porch, and side walk in around an hour. I'm amazed. My husband set it up in about 20 minutes and it started without issue. One bolt came loose during shipping but it was in the box and my husband just reassembled it. Powerful machine that I look forward to using again soon.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a powerful washer
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It has power and is designed really well. My only small complaint is the hose is hard to put away as it does not store well. But performance is key and this washer rocks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to use without having to ask my husband
customer_reviews.text: I love this power washer. It is powerful, it did our entire house and patio with no issues. Comes with multiple nozzles which fit nicely on top. Hoses come on and off easily. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: owned it for two days easy to assemble, be sure to add crankcase oil correctly easy to start works very well
customer_reviews.author: Leala

customer_reviews.title: A must buy with great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: WEN is an excellent brand. I have their generator, planner and now a presure washer that I’m very happy with. Very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Plenty of power to wash my truck or the house
customer_reviews.author: Zachary R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works so good. Took the mold right off the siding of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WEN PW3100 3100 PSI 2.5 GPM Gas Pressure Washer with 208cc Engine (CARB Compliant)
product_meta.description: Remember when your driveway wasn’t covered with a layer of dirt and grime? The WEN 3100 PSI Pressure Washer blasts away unwanted filth to bring back the clean and pristine surface hiding underneath. The powerful 208 cc 4-stroke OHV engine pumps up to 2.5 gallons per minute. The 30 foot hose gives a far range of reach while the 12 inch wheels provide for easy mobility throughout a variety of terrain. Quick change connectivity simplifies the process of switching from nozzle to nozzle. Pop on the soap nozzle for cleaning cars, RVs, and boats. Aside from the soap nozzle, this package also includes 0°, 15°, 25°, and 40° nozzles to meet the needs of a variety of projects with varying sizes and surface sensitivities. Pour up to 32 fluid ounces of detergent into the onboard soap tank to provide extra cleaning power for tough jobs. And because it’s a WEN product, your purchase comes backed by a two-year warranty, a friendly customer service help line, and a nationwide network of skilled service technicians. Let that driveway shine like new with the WEN 3100 PSI Pressure Washer. Remember when you had a reliable pressure washer to do the work for you? Remember WEN.
feature_bullets: Powerful 208 cc 4-stroke OHV engine pumps 2.5 gallons per minute
Includes five quick connect nozzles: 0°, 15°, 25°, 40°, and soap
Axial cam pump provides a reliable spray while maximizing the lifespan of the unit.Gun to Lance Connection:M22 Threaded
12 inch wheels move effortlessly throughout a variety of tough terrains
Includes a 30-foot reinforced hose, an onboard soap tank, a quick-connect spray gun, and a two-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
